SQLDataSource.Name: C_EA_Chargeable_Work
SQLDataSource.Where:
((CUST_ORDER_NO is null and STATE = 'WorkDone' and &AO.C_EA_Customization_Util_API.Check_Cause_Discount(wo_no, '$COMPANY$', '$CONTRACT$', 'Chargeable')='TRUE' ) OR (STATE = 'Reported' and &AO.Customer_Order_API.Get_State(CUST_ORDER_NO) not in ('Invoiced/Closed') and &AO.C_EA_Customization_Util_API.Check_Cause_Discount(wo_no, '$COMPANY$', '$CONTRACT$','Chargeable')='TRUE' )) and &AO.Sc_Service_Contract_Api.Get_Contract_Type(CONTRACT_ID) LIKE NVL('$CONTRACT TYPE$','%')
and CONTRACT like NVL('$CONTRACT$','%') and &AO.COMPANY_SITE_API.get_Company(CONTRACT) like NVL('$COMPANY$','%')
